text: Toca ahe jyane akasanna va jaminila saha divasanta nirmana kele, maga arsa (sinhasana) vara uncavala to cangalya prakare janato tya gostila, ji jaminita jate ani ji ticyatuna nighate, ani ji akasatuna khali yete ani ji cadhuna akasata jate ani tumhi kothehi â€Œsa, to tumacyasobata ahe ani tumhi je kahi karita ahata, allaha te pahata ahe
